Description: Wooden furniture element inlaid with polychrome glass Hieroglyphs(many missing) including the name of Ptolemy V Epiphanes; the top terminal is in the form of the head of Ra(?) with a yellow solar-disc, an inlaid black glass eye and a polychrome mosaic glass collar; down one side runs a tongue-and-groove joint; the reverse is covered with linen and plaster; all surfaces are worn.
Bibliographic references: Tait 1991 / Five Thousand Years of Glass (pl.63)
Associated names: Named in inscription: Ptolemy V Epiphanes
